rows.label: qst100808_msg0001
rows.name: Why didn't you come after me yourself?!

rows.label: qst100808_msg0002
rows.name:
We're partners, aren't we?
If you think it's dangerous,
come and stop me yourself!

rows.label: qst100808_msg0003
rows.name: I-it can't be helped!

rows.label: qst100808_msg0004
rows.name:
High places, cliffs, slippery
spots, rocky areas... Scary
things are scary!

rows.label: qst100808_msg0005
rows.name:
And if you were going to go
further than planned, you could
have checked with me first!

rows.label: qst100808_msg0006
rows.name:
This would have been over
if you'd just not been
scared and followed me!

rows.label: qst100808_msg0007
rows.name:
If you're such a coward, we
can't have any more adventures!

rows.label: qst100808_msg0008
rows.name: That's...

rows.label: qst100808_msg0201
rows.name: How should I calm them down?

rows.label: qst100808_msg0202
rows.name: Tell them they complement each other

rows.label: qst100808_msg0203
rows.name: Scold them for being reckless

rows.label: qst100808_msg0301
rows.name: Complement... each other...

rows.label: qst100808_msg0302
rows.name:
I... I'm not good at
exploring, but you can
count on me in a fight, Shal.

rows.label: qst100808_msg0303
rows.name:
You go on ahead, Shal, and
find scenery I've never seen
before and wait for me.

rows.label: qst100808_msg0304
rows.name:
I may be slow... but I'll
do my best to catch up.

rows.label: qst100808_msg0305
rows.name: Kapha...

rows.label: qst100808_msg0306
rows.name:
You're right. We promised
to find wonderful places
together, didn't we?

rows.label: qst100808_msg0307
rows.name: Alright! I'll leave my back to you!

rows.label: qst100808_msg0308
rows.name:
I'll make the difficult paths
easier for you to walk!

rows.label: qst100808_msg0401
rows.name:
It's true, if you hadn't
come, I might have charged
at the monsters by myself...

rows.label: qst100808_msg0402
rows.name:
Monsters?! Were there monsters
where the Healing Herb was?

rows.label: qst100808_msg0403
rows.name: Y-yes...

rows.label: qst100808_msg0404
rows.name:
If these people hadn't come, what
would have happened to you, Shal?

rows.label: qst100808_msg0405
rows.name: ...I'm sorry.

rows.label: qst100808_msg0406
rows.name:
You're too reckless, and I'm
too much of a coward...

rows.label: qst100808_msg0407
rows.name:
We need to be careful about each
other's shortcomings, don't we?

rows.label: qst100808_msg0501
rows.name: Everyone... Thank you so much.

rows.label: qst100808_msg0502
rows.name: I'm sorry for causing you trouble...

rows.label: qst100808_msg0503
rows.name:
The Healing Herb... thank you!
The doctor will be pleased.

rows.label: qst100808_msg0504
rows.name:
From now on, we'll continue
our journey together,
without being reckless.

rows.label: qst100808_msg0505
rows.name: If you don't mind, please... take this.

rows.label: qst100808_msg0506
rows.name: Well then, goodbye!
